main event: On 29 October 1957, a pencil-shaped object was sighted in Bismarck, North Dakota, moving fast and climbing slowly.
interesting points: The observation lasted for 20 minutes., The sighting involved a ground-radar type of observation., Two witnesses were present, one was a GOC observer., The object was estimated to be 44 feet thick and 1/2 mile long., The object turned black and disappeared after the sighting.
witness description: One of the witnesses was on duty as a GOC observer.
